name: Nettechnocrats
tagline: Over 1000+ Website and Mobile App delivered global
description:
Nettechnocrats is a best software and technology oriented company based in India providing Website, Mobile application, custom software development and related challenges catering to the need of all types of startups as well as bluechip companies to grow their business. We are ISO 9001:2008 Certified, Google & Microsoft Network Partner Company. We have a team of 150+ certified professionals who are well versed in a programming language.
Within a short span of 8 years, we have 1500+ satisfied clients across the globe with 2500+ projects delivered successfully. What separates us from our counterparts is the ability to provide the best web design, web marketing, and ecommerce as well as web development solutions to a range of clients cutting across business verticals. 
 
Industries we have catered to: 
eCommerce(B2B & B2C), real estate, eLearning, Tour and Travels, Media and Entertainment, Logistics and Transportation, Hospitality, Gaming & Sports, Social Networking, Manufacturing, Retail/Auction/Price Comparison, Marketplace, Chatbots, Services Booking, Banking, Finance, Insurance, cryptocurrency exchange, IOC, blockchain based system, Smart Contracts, Medical and Health Care, Automotive, Taxi Booking, Online food ordering, news portals, Enterprise solutions, Matrimonial and Dating, Recruitment and Jobs, and Government and much more
